bind.relevant: /data/consent_yes/breech_position = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/post_partum_hemorrhage != 'yes' and /data/consent_yes/placenta_previa != 'yes' and /data/consent_yes/retained_placenta != 'yes' and /data/consent_yes/prolonged_labour != 'yes' and /data/consent_yes/number_of_pregnancies > 1 and /data/consent_yes/mother_age >= 18 and /data/consent_yes/eclampsia != 'yes' and /data/consent_yes/big_baby = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/high_bp = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/diabetes = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/sickle_cell = 'no'

/data/consent_yes/breech_position = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/post_partum_hemorrhage = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/placenta_previa = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/retained_placenta = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/prolonged_labour = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/number_of_pregnancies = 1 or /data/consent_yes/mother_age < 18 or /data/consent_yes/mother_age > 35 or /data/consent_yes/eclampsia = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/big_baby = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/high_bp = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/diabetes = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/sickle_cell = 'yes'

(/data/consent_yes/c_section_delivery = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/abortions_or_miscarriages > 1 or /data/consent_yes/deliveries > 5 or /data/consent_yes/stillbirth > 1 or /data/consent_yes/perineal_tear = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/cardiac_disease = 'yes') and /data/consent_yes/breech_position = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/post_partum_hemorrhage = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/placenta_previa = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/retained_placenta = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/prolonged_labour = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/number_of_pregnancies > 1 and /data/consent_yes/mother_age >= 18 and /data/consent_yes/eclampsia = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/big_baby = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/high_bp = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/diabetes = 'no' and /data/consent_yes/sickle_cell = 'no'

bind.calculate: if(/data/consent_yes/breech_position = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/post_partum_hemorrhage = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/placenta_previa = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/retained_placenta = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/prolonged_labour = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/number_of_pregnancies = 1 or /data/consent_yes/mother_age < 18 or /data/consent_yes/mother_age > 35 or /data/consent_yes/eclampsia = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/big_baby = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/high_bp = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/diabetes = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/sickle_cell = 'yes', /data/consent_yes/nearest_PHCC, /data/consent_yes/nearest_dc_health_facility)

if(/data/consent_yes/cardiac_disease = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/deliveries > 5 or /data/consent_yes/perineal_tear = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/c_section_delivery = 'yes' or /data/consent_yes/abortions_or_miscarriages > 1 or /data/consent_yes/stillbirth > 1 or (/data/consent_yes/abortions_or_miscarriages > 0 and /data/consent_yes/stillbirth >0) ,/data/consent_yes/nearest_referral_hospital,/data/dc_phcc)

text.value: ELEZEA KWA MAMA: Madhumuni ya simu hii ni kuimarisha kuwasiliana na kubadilishana taarifa ili uweze kuwa na uzazi salama.
ELEZEA KWA MAMA: Ningependa kukuuliza kuhusu wewe mwenyewe na afya yako. Kama kuna maswali ambayo hutaki kujibu, huna sababu ya kujibu.
MUULIZE MAMA: Je unakubali muhudumu kutumia simu?
WEKA SIMU PEMBENI NA UTOE HUDUMA KAMA KAWAIDA.
Umri wa mama uliongiza sio sahihi
Muulize Mama RCH CARD. INGIZA namba ya usajili ya mama kutoka katika kadi ya kilinik ya wajawazito kama ipo
Jina la kituo mama anachotumia wakati wa uja uzito na baada ya kujifungua.
Jina la Kituo cha Afya kilichokaribu kwa kujifungua.
Jina la PHCC iliyokaribu. Kama hakuna PHCC, chagua hospitali ya karibu.
Mueleze MAMA: Sasa Nitakuuliza maswali kuhusu mimba yako ya sasa na mimba zilizopita.
Angalia kadi yake ya kilinic. Ni lini alipata siku zake kwa mara ya mwisho iliyoandikwa kwenye kadi? Kama haijaandikwa muulize mama ni lini alipata siku zake kwa mara ya mwisho
Angalia kadi yake ya kliniki ya ujawazito. Matazamio ya kujigugua yaliopo iko kwenye kadi?
Ni lini matazamio ya kujifungua yaliopo kwenye kadi?
Tarehe ya matazamio haiwezi kuwa siku za nyuma
Hii ni mimba yako ya ngapi?
Idadi ya mimba haiwezi kuwa chini ya 1
Ni mimba ngapi zimeharibika/zimetoka chini ya miezi 6?
Idadi ya mimba zilizoharibika haziwezi kua zaidi ya idadi ya mimba
Je ulishawahi kujifungua kwa kusaidiwa kuvutwa na mashine?
Umepoteza watoto wangapi katika ujauzito usiozidi miezi 6?
Je umeshawahi kuwa na haya yafuatayo wakati ukijifungua katika mimba zilizopita?
Uchungu wa muda mrefu( 12 masaa au zaidi)
Kuchanika njia ya uzazi(karibia ya njia ya choo kikubwa)
Kutokwa damu nyingi baada ya kujifungua
Muulize mama au angalia kadi yake ya kilinik: Je umeambiwa kuwa huu uja uzito wako mtoto katanguliza makalio?
Muulize mama au angalia kadi yake ya kilinik: Je umeambiwa kuwa huu uja uzito wako mtoto atakuwa mkubwa(Zaidi ya 4kg)
Je unamatatizo yoyote ya kiafya, kati ya yafuatayo?
Je umeshauriwa na Mhudumu wa Afya kujifungulia kituo kikubwa zaidi ya hicho unachopatia huduma kama hospitali?
MSHAURI MAMA: Asante kwa majibu yako. Kwa afya yako na mtoto ni vizuri mwanao kumzalia
MSHAURI MAMA: Asante kwa majibu yako.Wewe na mwanao mnaweza kuwa kwenye hali ya hatari zaidi kuliko ujauzito wa kawaida hivyo unatakiwa kuzalia .
MSHAURI MAMA: Asante kwa majibu yako. Wewe pamoja na mtoto mpo kwenye matatizo na unatakiwa kupanga kuzalia HOSPITALI ya

MSHAURI MAMA: Sisi tutalipa gharama za usafiri katika kukupeleka kwenye kituo cha afya au hospitali. Hivyo utahitajika kuhifadhi pesa kwa ajili ya vitu vingine kama vitahitajika ili wewe na mtoto kuwa na afya bora.
MSHAURI MAMA: Hakikisha unakula vizuri,punguza kufanya kazi ngumu na pata mapumziko kwa wingi wakati wa ujauzito.
MSHAURI MAMA: Andaa chupa ya uji,kanga safi pamoja na mpira wa kulalia wakati wakwenda kituoni.
MSHAURI MAMA: Utaamua nani atakaa nyumbani kuangalia familia na nani atakae kusindikiza kwenye kituo.

MSHAURI MAMA:Kama utahisi dalili za hatari zifuatazo niite mara moja niandae usafiri kwenda kituoni -kutokwa na maji au damu -kuvimba uso na mikono -kukakamaa -homa kali -mtoto kutokucheza -kuumwa kichwa sana au kizunguzungu.
MUULIZE MAMA: Sitaki kujua matokeo, lakini umewahi kupima VVU (virusi vya Ukimwi) kama sehemu ya huduma yako kiliniki?
MSHAURI MAMA: Kama ndiyo mama mjamzito anajua kuwa ana VVU au Ukimwi, anaweza kupata dawa yake na kwa kutunza afya yake, na mtoto wake akaweza kuzaliwa bila VVU.
MSHAURI MAMA: Kila mama mjamzito anapaswa kujua hali yake ya maambukizo ya VVU. Unaweza kupata taarifa zaidi kuhusu VVU na Ukimwi na kuweza kupima katika kilinik yako ya karibu ya PMTCT.
Je unakubali kuzalia katika kituo cha afya kama tulivyo jadiliana?

Mkumbushe mama umuhimu wa kuzalia kituo cha afya kwa sababu zifuatazo: - Ni salama kwa afya yako na mtoto. - Kuna ushirikiano wa wataalam wa huduma za afya. - Huwezi kujua ni bahati mbaya gani inaweza kujitokeza. - Huduma za kujifungua ni bure. - Vituo ni visafi na vina dawa halisi.
Je naweza kuongea na mwenye kukutolea ruhusa ya kwenda kujifungulia kule?
Tafadhali kumbuka kuongea na huyu mtu baadae na ujaze fomu ya ruhusa.
EXPLAIN TO MOTHER: The purpose of this phone is to better communicate, collect and share information so that you can have a safer birth.
EXPLAIN TO MOTHER: I would like to ask you some questions about yourself and your health. If there are questions that you do not want to answer, you do not have to answer them.
ASK MOTHER: Do you consent to use phone?
PUT PHONE DOWN AND PROVIDE CARE AS USUAL.
Ask to see mother's RCH4 card. ENTER mother's Registration number from RCH4 card if available
Client's facility name based on RCH4 card or ask mother where she attends prenatal/postnatal care.
Name of nearest facility for delivery
Name of nearest cottage hospital (PHCC). Choose district hospital if no close cottage hospital.
EXPLAIN TO MOTHER: Now I will ask you about your pregnancy and any of your previous pregnancies.
Check the mother's ANC card. What is the LMP (last menstral period) listed on the card? (If not listed, ask the woman the first day of her last meanstrual period).
Check the mother's RCH4 card. Is there an EDD listed?
What is the EDD (expected date of delivery) list in card?
Expected date of delivery should be in future
How many pregnancies have you had including this one?
Number of pregnancy can not be less than 1
How many miscarriages/abortions have you had (loss of pregnancy at under 6 months gestation)?
Number of abortion can not exceed the number of pregnancies
How many previous deliveries have you had?
Have you previously delivered by C-section?
Have you previously delivered by vacuum?
How many stillbirths have you had (loss of pregnancy over 6 months gestation)?
Have you had any of the following during previous deliveries?
Ask mother or look at RCH card: Have you been told your current pregnancy is in a breech position?
Ask mother or look at RCH card: Have you been told your current pregnancy will be a big baby (more than 4kg)
Do you have any of the following medical conditions?
Has a health worker advised you deliver at a higher level facility than your local health facility such as a hospital?
ADVISE MOTHER: Thank you for your answers. For you and your baby's health, it is good to deliver your baby at
ADVISE MOTHER: Thank you for your answers. You and your baby may be at higher risk than a normal pregnancy so you should give birth at .
ADVISE MOTHER: Thank you for your answers. You and your baby are at risk of complications and should plan to give birth at
ADVISE MOTHER: We will pay for your transport to the health facility or hospital. Save money for other things that you and your baby will need to have a safe delivery and stay healthy.
ADVISE MOTHER: Make sure to eat well, reduce your workload, and get plenty of rest during pregnancy.
ADVISE MOTHER: Prepare a flask of porridge, clean kangas and a makintosh to bring with you to the facility
ADVISE MOTHER: Decide who will stay home to take care of the rest of your family and who will escort you to the facility.

ADVISE MOTHER: If you experience any of the following danger signs call me immediately and I will arrange transport to the facility because they are very dangerous. - leakage of fluid or blood. - swollen face and hands. - fits/convulsions. - high fever. - lack of fetal movement.- severe headache or dizziness.
ASK MOTHER: I do not want to know the results, but have you been tested for HIV (the AIDS virus) as part of your antenatal care?
ADVISE MOTHER: If a pregnant mother knows she has HIV or AIDS, she can get medicine to keep her healthy, and her baby can be born without HIV.
ADVISE MOTHER: Every pregnant mother should know her HIV status. You can find out more about HIV/AIDS and get tested at your nearest PMTCT clinic.
Do you agree to give birth at a health facility as we have discussed?

Remind mother of the importance of facility delivery for the following reasons: - It's safer for your health and your baby. - There is a team of skilled health workers. - You cannot predict what might go wrong.- Delivery is free. - Facility is clean and hygienic and has the right medicines.
Can I talk with the person who can grant you permission to go to the facility for delivery?
Please remember to talk to this person later and fill the permission form.
